name: litellm-connector-copilot
description: An extension that integrates LiteLLM proxy into Copilot

baseUrl.description: Base URL for the LiteLLM proxy server
baseUrl.title: Base URL

apiKey.description: API key for LiteLLM proxy authentication
apiKey.title: API Key

litellm-connector.disableQuotaToolRedact.description: Disable per-turn tool redaction when a quota error is detected in chat history. Leave off to keep redaction enabled.

litellm-connector.inactivityTimeout.description: Timeout in seconds of inactivity before the LiteLLM proxy connection is considered idle.

litellm-connector.disableCaching.description: When enabled, LiteLLM caching will be bypassed by sending 'no-cache: true' and 'Cache-Control: no-cache' headers.

scripts.vscode:pack:dev: npm run clean:build && tsc --noEmit && node esbuild.js && npx vsce package
scripts.vscode:pack: npm run clean:build && tsc --noEmit && node esbuild.js --production && npx vsce package
scripts.package:marketplace: cp README.md README.github.md && cp README.marketplace.md README.md && npm run vscode:pack && mv README.github.md README.md
scripts.postdownload-api: yes n | dts main && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('vscode.d.ts')) { fs.renameSync('vscode.d.ts', 'src/vscode.d.ts'); console.log('Moved vscode.d.ts to src/'); }"
scripts.test:report: export VSCODE_TEST_RESULTS_DIR=$PWD/test-results && mkdir -p $VSCODE_TEST_RESULTS_DIR && npm run test
scripts.test:coverage: npm run pretest && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const coveragePath = path.join(process.cwd(), 'coverage'); if (fs.existsSync(coveragePath)) fs.rmSync(coveragePath, { recursive: true, force: true });" && export VSCODE_TEST_RESULTS_DIR=$PWD/test-results && mkdir -p $VSCODE_TEST_RESULTS_DIR && xvfb-run vscode-test --args="--no-sandbox" --coverage --coverage-output coverage --coverage-reporter lcovonly --coverage-reporter html --coverage-reporter text-summary
